result.execSummary:
The defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Registry Violation, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(6)(a)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes:
Straight time. No good time.
Consecutive to: any sentence

miscConds.notes: No further violations of the law rising to the level of probable cause. No use or possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Absolute sobriety with random urine screens.
Attend treatment and counseling programs as determined by agent. Fully comply with the sex offender registry. Screen for sex offender treatment and comply with any ongoing treatment.

Provide DNA sample (unless previously submitted) and pay surcharge. Pay all supervision fees. Pay applicable costs, surcharges, victim/witness surcharge and assessments while on probation; any balance remaining unpaid at that time is to be converted to a civil judgment against the defendant.
Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  Firearm possession; Voting and Child sex offender working with children.
Continue to comply with psychiatric treatment from Gateway for Change, Fokus Family Services and take all prescribed medication;.
Attend the probation review hearing on 1/9/2015 at 8:30 a.m. in Br 44.

timeConds.notes:
STAYED; to be used at the discretion of the agent.
***01-09-2015, Judge Konkol, Defendant's housing situation will change on 1-15-15.***
***03-09-2015, Judge Konkol, Defendant's housing situation has been taken care of and is in compliance. Court will not schedule any further review date. Court continues to stay on the  House of Correction time. The agent can bring the case back into court if necessary.***

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court.  Jesica Ballenger for Joshua Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Mary Sobecki, probation agent, appears.  Defendant's housing situation has been taken care of and is in compliance.  Court will not schedule any further review date.  Court continues the stay on the House of Correction time.   The agent can bring the case back into court if necessary.

Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court.   Christopher Liegel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Mary Sobecki, agent appears.   Defendant is in compliance.  Defendant's housing situation will change on 1-15-15.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for March 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Probation Status Review report received and filed./ds
JusticePoint report received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk kmh.
Letter on behalf of the defendant recieved and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk kmh.

Attorney Donald C Dudley call the court.  Joshua M Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin via telephone.
Deputy Court Clerk kmh.
Case scheduled for sentencing today.  Defense counsel contacted the court in the morning.  Defense counsel had a death in the family and is not able to appear.  Parties notified of new sentencing date.   Case is adjourned to Br 12.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 07-30-2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint report received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk kmh.

AS TO COUNT  1 AS AMENDED - 
The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Jury Instructions and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.
Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  Firearm possession; Voting and Child sex offender working with children.
Jury trial date of 5/27/2014 is vacated. 
Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement received and filed. 
Case adjourned to Branch 12.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 05-22-2014 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court with attorney Donald C Dudley.  Joshua M Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk kmh.
Case scheduled for a final pretrial.  Parties have reached a resolution to this matter.  Plea negotiations placed on the record.  
AS TO COUNT 1 - 
On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Sex Registry Violation, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes section(s)301.45(6)(a)1 , a Class H Felony.
JusticePoint report received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk kmh.

Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court with attorney Donald C Dudley.  Joshua M. Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk kmh.
Case scheduled for a bail hearing.  State withdraws its request for a bail hearing. Parties request a trial.   Case set for final pretrial on 4/28/2014 at 8:30 am.  Jury trial set for 5/27/2014 at 8:30 am.  All final pretrial documents to be filed by the final pretrial hearing.    Case is adjourned to Br 12.
JusticePoint report received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk kmh.

Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court with attorney Donald C Dudley.  Joshua M. Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
 Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Branch 12, Judge David Borowski presiding.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 12.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for February 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Report dated 1/22/14.
css

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in court with attorney Debra J Patterson.  Defendant Roosevelt Rodney Means in custody.  David Robles appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Borowski, Branch 12.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a Preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
